title: 4 Quick Steps to Craft a Chest Storage in Terraria

steps.title: Craft a work bench and place it down.
steps.content: Craft a work bench and place it down. You'll need 10 Wood blocks. Use an axe on nearby trees to get wood blocks, and then open your inventory's crafting menu to craft it. [1] X Research source You can also find work benches by looting Dungeons and Underground Cabins . Be sure to place down the crafting stations in a protected house to avoid enemies.

steps.title: Gather 8 Wood blocks and 2 Iron Bars.
steps.content: Gather 8 Wood blocks and 2 Iron Bars. These materials are needed for one standard chest. To craft other types of chests, you'll need different resources. For example: Slime Chest : 8 Slime blocks and 2 Iron Bars Ash Wood Chest : 8 Ash Wood blocks and 2 Iron Bars Cactus Chest : 8 Cactus and 2 Iron Bars Sandstone Chest : 8 Smooth Sandstone and 2 Iron Bars

steps.title: Open the Crafting menu.
steps.content: Open the Crafting menu. This can be found in your Inventory. Make sure to stand near the work bench. The work bench unlocks other crafting recipes, such as beds , looms , sawmills , and more.

steps.title: Select the Chest icon.
steps.content: Select the Chest icon. You may need to scroll up or down the crafting menu. This will craft the chest and add it to your inventory. If you're playing on a computer, you may have to drag the chest icon to your inventory.
